Nightlight/Windlord::

Nightlight and Windlord heard it and walked to conference room. 
Trinity heard it too and she ran to conference room.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> Grounded heard everything that was commencing. About Deemos, and 
> Trinity. "I must do something." He opened a comm link to all of the 
> Chivtron. "This is Grounded, I am calling a meeting starting 
> immediatly.  Meet in the confernece room. It is urgent and 
invaluable 
> to miss for our defense. Thank you." He began a walk for the 
> Conference room.
